forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. N winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 8C. NNW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 48F. NNW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
